decks.notes: This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using efficient removal spells and creatures with disruptive abilities. It also aims to apply pressure on the opponent's life total quickly with aggressive creatures. The deck utilizes flicker effects to reuse enter-the-battlefield abilities of creatures like Recruiter of the Guard and Skyclave Apparition. The Aether Vial helps cheat creatures into play at instant speed, allowing for surprise plays. Overall, the deck seeks to control the board while consistently applying pressure on the opponent to secure a victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It includes various low-cost creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, as well as powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to control the board and deal damage efficiently. The deck also includes cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for additional firepower. The mana base is carefully crafted with fetch lands to ensure consistent colors and smooth mana curve. The deck aims to play aggressively and efficiently to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the opponent's moves by countering their spells, removing their threats, and disrupting their game plan with disruptive spells like Sink into Stupor and Thought Scour. The deck aims to maintain card advantage and board control through spells like Subtlety and Psychic Frog while also utilizing powerful win conditions like Murktide Regent. The deck also includes targeted removal spells like Fatal Push and Spell Snare to deal with specific threats. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of lands to ensure consistency in mana colors and sources.

This aggressive Mardu deck focuses on utilizing a variety of powerful creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. With a mix of efficient removal like Fatal Push and Prismatic Ending, as well as strong creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for additional value and flexibility in different matchups. Overall, this deck is designed to be fast and relentless in its attacks.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with creatures and using cards like Goryo's Vengeance to bring them back onto the battlefield for powerful instant reanimation combos. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the board and protect the combo pieces. The goal is to efficiently reanimate high-impact creatures such as Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.
